title: Per-unit subsidy for efficiency in vaccinations

content.prompt: Assume that the marginal social benefit of the last unit of vaccination provided is greater than the marginal social cost. Which of the following can be used to achieve efficiency in the market for vaccination?

choices.label: A limit on the quantity of vaccinations
